subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Maharaja Pratap Singh of Kota?
question_hi: कोटी के महाराजा प्रताप सिंग के बनाये गए एक फोट कौन से है।
explanation_en:
The famous fort built by Maharaja Pratap Singh is Kumbhalgarh Fort. It is also known as the 'Lion Fort' due to its imposing structure.

प्रताप सिंग के बनाये स्नान के लौह फोट
explanation_hi: महाराजा प्रताप सिंग के बनाये स्नान के लौह फोट

subject: Rajasthan History
explanation_en:
Rajasthan state was formed on October 1, 1949.

राजस्थान के कैंड, 1949 के 1 अक्ति के समय
explanation_hi: राजस्थान के कांट्टि, 1949 के कैंड के समय

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the king during the construction of Mehrangarh Fort?
question_hi: मेरांगर के बन्ने कांत्ति, राजा राम सिंगे पूर्व
explanation_en:
Raja Man Singh I was the ruler during the construction of Mehrangarh Fort.

राजा मांद सिंगे पूर्व
